text: beshak jo log in baaton ko jo khuda ne kitaab mein naazil kee hai chhipaate hain aur usake badale thodee see qeemat (dunayaavee nafa) le leten hai ye log bas angaaron se apane pet bharate hain aur qayaamat ke din khuda un se baat tak to karega nahin aur na unhen (gunaahon se) paak karega aur unheen ke lie dardanaak azaab hai
